chapter.text: 90|3|sapatha janmadatara o ya se janma diyeche [1].
90|4|Nihsandehe amara manusake srsti karechi kasta-klesera madhye [1].
90|5|Se ki mane kare ye, kakhano tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
90|7|Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
90|8|amara ki tara jan'ya srsti karini ducokha
90|11|Tabe se to bandhura giripathe [1] prabesa kareni.
90|12|Ara kise apanake janabe--- bandhura giripatha ki
90|17|tadupari se tadera antarbhukta haye yaya yara imana eneche ebam parasparake upadesa diyeche dhairya dharanera, ara paraspara upadesa diyeche daya anugrahera [1]
90|19|Ara yara amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kareche, tara'i hatabhagya.
